articles.title: Ronaldo agents 'impressed' by Manchester United chief as options across Europe fade - Football365
articles.description: Ronaldo and his agents have let it be known that they have appreciated being given permission to fail to secure a transfer elsewhere.
articles.content:
The agents of Ronaldo are making their first steps to heal the relationship with Manchester United fans by letting it be known that they are ‘impressed’ with the club’s chief executive.
